wikipedia_page.main: Guy Edward Barham Walters (born 8 August 1971) is a British author, historian, and journalist. He is the author and editor of nine books on the Second World War, including war thrillers, and a historical analysis of the Berlin Olympic Games.

response: * Diary of a Hapless Househusband (2007) (as Sam Holden),
